languages.text: {n}Вир недоуменно почесывает затылок.{/n} "Мы это. Те, кто остался. Те, кто выжил, дабы искупить грехи нашего мира перед всевидящим ликом Его!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Вир недоуменно почесывает затылок.{/n} "Мы это. Те, кто остался. Те, кто выжил, дабы искупить грехи нашего мира перед всевидящим ликом Его!"

languages.text: {n}Vir scratches his head in confusion.{/n} "That's us. The ones who remain. Those who survived to atone for the faults of our world before His all-seeing eyes!"
languages.original_text: {n}Вир недоуменно почесывает затылок.{/n} "Мы это. Те, кто остался. Те, кто выжил, дабы искупить грехи нашего мира перед всевидящим ликом Его!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Vir scratches his head in confusion.{/n} "That's us. The ones who remain. Those who survived to atone for the sins of our world before His all-seeing eyes!"
{n}Vir scratches his head in confusion.{/n} "That's us. The ones who remain. Those who survived to atone for the sins of our world before His all-seeing eyes!"

{n}Vir scratches his head in confusion.{/n} "That's us. The ones who remain. Those who survived to atone for the faults of our world before His all-seeing eyes!"

languages.text: {n}ヴィルは頭をかきながら戸惑った。{/n}「これが私たちです。生き残った者たち。私たちは、神帝陛下の全智の眼差しにおいて、この世界の過ちを償うために生き残った者です！」
languages.original_text: {n}Vir scratches his head in confusion.{/n} "That's us. The ones who remain. Those who survived to atone for the faults of our world before His all-seeing eyes!"

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴィルは頭をかきながら戸惑った。{/n}「これが私たちです。生き残った者たち。私たちは、神帝陛下の全智の眼差しにおいて、この世界の過ちを償うために生き残った者です！」

languages.text: {n}Confus, Vir se gratte la tempe.{/n} « Nous sommes ces Enfants. Ceux qui restent. Ceux qui ont survécu afin d'expier les péchés de notre monde, sous Son regard omniscient ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Vir scratches his head in confusion.{/n} "That's us. The ones who remain. Those who survived to atone for the faults of our world before His all-seeing eyes!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Confus, Vir se gratte la tempe.{/n} « Nous sommes ces Enfants. Ceux qui restent. Ceux qui ont survécu afin d'expier les péchés de notre monde, sous Son regard omniscient ! »

languages.text: {n}维尔困惑地挠挠头。{/n}“就是我们，是那些活下来的人。我们活下来，就是为了能在神皇全知之眼的注视下，弥补这个世界曾犯下的过错！”
languages.original_text: {n}Vir scratches his head in confusion.{/n} "That's us. The ones who remain. Those who survived to atone for the faults of our world before His all-seeing eyes!"

traits.locale_text: {n}维尔困惑地挠挠头。{/n}“就是我们，是那些活下来的人。我们活下来，就是为了能在神皇全知之眼的注视下，弥补这个世界曾犯下的过错！”

languages.text: {n}Vir se rasca la cabeza confundido.{/n} «Esos somos nosotros. Los que quedamos. ¡Los que sobrevivimos para expiar los pecados de nuestro mundo ante Sus ojos que todo lo ven!».
languages.original_text: {n}Vir scratches his head in confusion.{/n} "That's us. The ones who remain. Those who survived to atone for the faults of our world before His all-seeing eyes!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Vir se rasca la cabeza confundido.{/n} «Esos somos nosotros. Los que quedamos. ¡Los que sobrevivimos para expiar los pecados de nuestro mundo ante Sus ojos que todo lo ven!».

languages.text: {n}Vir kratzt sich verwirrt am Kopf.{/n} "Das sind wir. Die, die noch übrig sind. Die, die überlebt haben, um für seinen allsehenden Augen für die Fehler unserer Welt zu büßen!"
languages.original_text: {n}Vir scratches his head in confusion.{/n} "That's us. The ones who remain. Those who survived to atone for the faults of our world before His all-seeing eyes!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Vir kratzt sich verwirrt am Kopf.{/n} "Das sind wir. Die, die noch übrig sind. Die, die überlebt haben, um für seinen allsehenden Augen für die Fehler unserer Welt zu büßen!"

languages.text: {n}Vir şaşkınlıkla başını kaşıyor.{/n} "Biziz. Geride kalanlar. O'nun her şeyi gören gözleri önünde yaptığımız hataların cezasını çekmek için hayatta kalanlar!"
languages.original_text: {n}Vir scratches his head in confusion.{/n} "That's us. The ones who remain. Those who survived to atone for the faults of our world before His all-seeing eyes!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Vir şaşkınlıkla başını kaşıyor.{/n} "Biziz. Geride kalanlar. O'nun her şeyi gören gözlerinin karşısında hatalarımızın cezasını çekmek için hayatta kalanlar!"
